page.title: 06Religion St Bart.s Church
page.content: 1t. Bartholomews church stands at the top of Church Hill. The first church was built around 1200, although services were held on the present site at the time of the first Domesday Survey. The church has a tower 80 feet high which houses a clock installed in 1887. The church bells are still in use and ca be heard regularly during the week. The most valuable thing in the church is the chalice. Last year some of the stonework had to be replaced because it was crumbling. Most of the church is made from sandstone. Our vicar is Mr. Frost. This morning he came to talk to the fourth year. Every year school leavers receive a bible adn prayer book. In 1669 Charles Winn, vicar of Penn, left some money for this. The Charles Winn foundation is still remembered today.
